good.title: Zowie EC2-A 鼠标
good.note: 我是手臂移动趴握型，EC2 大小适中，感觉这就是为我而生的一款鼠标。完美匹配我的手形和习惯。
good.note_en: I think the Zowie EC2 size is just right for me. I feel like it was made for me.

good.title: 畅网 J4125
good.note: 英特尔 10 代是目前性价比最高的软路由。我选了 J4125，没有安装虚拟机，单纯的安装 OpenWrt。
good.note_en: The Intel 10th generation is currently the best value software router. I chose the J4125 and didn't install any virtual machines, just a simple installation of OpenWrt.

good.title: 逸祺 T21 数字键盘
good.note: 便宜好用的机械数字键盘，主键盘是 87 键机械键盘，没有数字区。搭配用于大量数字输入场景。
good.note_en: A small keyboard used in conjunction with the main keyboard for numeric input.

good.title: Neutrogena 洗发水
good.note: 轮子哥推荐的去屑洗发水。最近这一年因为熬夜，头皮屑越来越多了，这款还行。用了之后基本上就没有头皮屑了。
good.note_en: vczh recommended anti-dandruff shampoo. this one works fine.

good.title: LAIANG 随行杯
good.note: 陶瓷内胆 316 不锈钢咖啡杯，没有异味。保温效果挺好，外带咖啡挺方便，不过有点点大了。
good.note_en: Ceramic inner liner, 316 stainless steel coffee cup, no peculiar smell.
